about_the_game: Have you ever wondered how your toys are in different spots, if they live a secret life of their own? When playing Mini Tank Arena you'll be able to first-hand experience the magic of toy tanks going head-to-head and reminisce the magic of being a young child playing with their toys. Play with multiple different tank types, and show off your competitive shooting skills in this new Battle Arena Shooter created for players everywhere.

short_description: Mini Tank Arena is a 4v4 multiplayer battle Arena shooter, play on different maps experience the battle styles of each unique tank, and see how each tank can synergize with other tanks to help elevate the playing field.
